title: Project Management in Practice - Planning, Scheduling and Resource Management
headline: Enhance your project management skills and practices for managing limited resources with this free online course.
description: This free online managing resources in project management course will teach you about planning, scheduling and resource management. It teaches the principles and practices in project management, the most effective and efficient resource allocation techniques that can be employed in technical projects. You will study project planning, scheduling, risk management, costs, budgets and resource allocation to achieve project objectives.
courseDescription:
Discover how to boost your project management skills with the free online Course Project Management in Practice - Planning, Scheduling and Resource Management. This course covers various principles and practices necessary for effective modern project management with a specific emphasis on planning, scheduling and resource management.

The course begins with a fundamental overview of the basic concepts in modern technical project management from project planning and scheduling to proficiently managing project, costs and budgets. You will also learn about strategies for identifying, evaluating, and managing project risks. Finally, you will learn about the most effective and efficient resource allocation techniques that can be employed in technical projects.

This course will be of special interest to mid-career professionals who value practical principles and guidance as well as students and researchers who wish to improve their knowledge of effective strategies for managing complex technical projects. This free online course also includes practical examples of how to apply concepts of project management to real-world issues. So, why wait? Start the course today and by the end of the week you will have gained valuable knowledge and project management skills!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.
